snippet.title: Luminus - Demo Trailer | Indie Game
snippet.description:
Luminus is a 2D puzzle-platformer, made by Last Angle Studio. The demo is coming out soon!

After a horrible accident, Benjamin’s only company is his battered teddy bear. Together, you must find your way to safety, while solving puzzles and evading those that hide in the dark. Find ways to repair your bear to unlock its full potential, and discover new ways it can help you on your journey.

Play the demo here:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1951420/The_Tower_of_Luminus/
